abilities.name: Unholy Speed
abilities.rule: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

abilities.name: Daemonic Icon
abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

abilities.name: Instrument of Chaos
abilities.rule: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Instrument of Chaos
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options: ■ 1 Seeker that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.
■ 1 Seeker that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
